rules_text:
Look at target player’s hand.
Each player chooses a card from his or her hand. Reveal those cards. Each player draws cards equal to the converted mana cost of his or her card, then discards twice that many cards if his or her card had the highest converted mana cost or tied for highest converted mana cost of the revealed cards.
notes:
2k17
Added Look at target player’s hand.

fluffy: chooses a card from his or her hand. Reveal those cards —> reveals a card from his or her hand (Friendly Fire says players can only reveal cards from their own hands and the chooses bit was extraneous), +converted mana cost (Padeem)
